name: Zico Apartments
text: Rental website that uses Sanity CMS as database.

name: Vivienne Daniels Store
text: Online shopping website I designed and developed. Users can browse products, add multiple quantities of different variants to cart, update their wishlist and checkout items.

name: My Vision Board
text: Vision board application that has the default vision board view and individual goals/visions with details when flipped over .

name: Reward.io
text: Crypto reward website. It is a single page application created with Vue js

name: Freebies--Coworking Space
text: This a single page application created with Gatsby Js and Tailwind css

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors ( Lizard, Spork )
text: This is adaptation of the Rock, Paper, Scissors game. Users can play against the computer by clicking the icons.

name: Where in the World
text: website that calls a REST API which returns data about the countries of the world. Users preview diffrent countries' flags and names and can search for countries by name
